1.0.name: wordpress/reduce-debt-plugin
1.0.description: Mobilize your BuddyPress network to reduce debt. This plugin allows BuddyPress users to input their loan amounts in order to chart their progress, receive Encourages from friends, earn Awards, receive monthly reminders to update their loan amounts, and determine their Debt Independence Day. No personal information is required except 'loan name' and 'loan amount'.
